main event: A visual observation of a dark gray colored, disk-shaped object hovering at low altitude in Mt. Clemens, Michigan on January 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was reported to move very fast to the southeast after hovering., The Air Force was unable to analyze original photographs because they were not received., Witnesses included civilians, specifically children who reported seeing the object., The object appeared to be further away than a nearby helicopter but was reported to be smaller., A family was reluctant to share their photographs despite the object being captured in images.
witness description: Civilians, specifically children from the local area.
